level.heading: APPLICABILITY (ยง 15-2600) The provisions of this Chapter shall apply to negotiations, mediations, andrbitrations of agreements or amended agreements among telecommunicationsarriers pursuant to Section 252 of the federal Telecommunications Act of 199647 U.S.C. ยง 252) and the District Telecommunications Competition Act of 1996D.C.
